## 

::: {style="text-align: center;"}
<h1 style="font-size: 1.5em; margin-top: 1em; text-transform: none;">

<strong>Bioconductor is not a package; itâ€™s a package
repository</strong>

</h1>
:::

::: {style="margin-top: 1em;"}
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.85em;"}
Bioconductor provides tools for the analysis, comprehension, and
visualization of genetic and genomic data as an R package repository
system. It is open source and open development, relying on community
contributed R packages.

::: {style="margin-top: 1em;"}
:::

## 

::: {style="text-align: center;"}
<h1 style="font-size: 1.5em; margin-top: 0em; text-transform: none;">

<strong>Bioconductor is an organization</strong>

</h1>
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.6em; text-align: left; max-width: 100%; margin: 0 auto;"}
Advisory Boards help shape the direction of the project and ensure
technological relevance:

-   **Bioconductor Foundation / European Bioconductor Society**\
    [501(c)(3) organization, handles money regarding conference
    organization, donations, and sponsorship]{style="opacity: 0.7;"}

-   **Scientific Advisory Board (SAB)**\
    [Provides external guidance and oversight of the scientific
    direction of the project. Invitation-only
    board.]{style="opacity: 0.7;"}

-   **Technical Advisory Board (TAB)**\
    [Advises on project and package-level infrastructure. Open call;
    elections held annually.]{style="opacity: 0.7;"}

-   **Community Advisory Board (CAB)**\
    [Dedicated to developing and diversifying the Bioconductor
    community. Open call; elections held
    annually.]{style="opacity: 0.7;"}

-   **Core Team**\
    [Developers maintaining core packages and
    infrastructure.]{style="opacity: 0.7;"}

-   **Global Bioconductor Community** ðŸŽ‰

**Note:** Bioconductor Foundation is being dissolved; NumFOCUS is now
fiscal sponsor.
:::

## 

::: {style="text-align: center;"}
<h1 style="font-size: 1em; margin-top: 0em; text-transform: none;">

<strong>Core Team: Infrastructure Development and Maintenance</strong>

</h1>
:::
::: {style="font-size: 0.5em; text-align: left; max-width: 100%; margin: 0 auto;"}
-   Develop and maintain Bioconductor infrastructure packages

-   Bioconductor.org maintenance

-   Support.bioconductor.org maintenance

-   Answering questions on all outlets

-   Bioconductor Build System (BBS) for daily builds and reporting

-   Docker Image generation

-   Binary Package generation (AnVIL/Docker)

-   New Package Submission (SPB) process and review

-   AWS infrastructure

-   Azure infrastructure

-   OSN infrastructure

-   Jetstream2 processes

-   Maintaining the git ecosystem

-   Package download stats

-   BiocManager maintenance

-   Bioconductor ExperimentHub and AnnotationHub integration

-   Outreachy projects

-   And more â€¦. So if we donâ€™t get to your question right away please be
    kind!
:::
